data.text: @enews Some of us don't have a choice since our shows get cancelled.  @ScorpionCBS which won an award at the Monte Carlo Festival after @CBS @CBSTVStudios cancelled it.  Not the right way to keep loyal viewers happy and now unlikely to watch other shows on the network. #SaveScorpion

@enews Because you wrap yourself up in there sorrows and triumphs. It's as if you're a long lost relative distantly waiting to appear and then you have the rug pulled out from under your feet. 😱 or you entwine your life, for that hour with the hero or heroine of the movie
